Jan. 23( Bloomberg)-- President Bush Secretary of State Colin Powell , a Republican who supported Democratic Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said he's not committed' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012.`` I'm not committed to Barack Obama , I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell , a retired Army general who was chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, said on CNN's`` State of the Union'' program today. Colin Powell said he won't decide whom to vote

Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

in Turkey, returned to the U.S. to have a lesion surgically removed from his right leg, spurring rumors he will retire. Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back! It's not yet known if the lesion is benign or not, or if it's a cyst. Allen Iverson , 35, is expected to be out for several weeks
